mapper.sql: ID, supply_id, supply_name, supply_type, receiptor_id, receiptor_depart_id, reamark, isdelete, createtime, amount, receiptor_name, receiptor_depart_name
mapper.delete: delete from t_xietong_supply_record where supply_name=#{name} and supply_type=#{type}
mapper.select: select supply_name from t_xietong_supply_record GROUP BY supply_name
select receiptor_depart_name from t_xietong_supply_record GROUP BY receiptor_depart_name
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(createtime,"%Y") AS years from t_xietong_supply_record GROUP BY years ORDER BY years

select * from t_xietong_supply_record a
and a.supply_name like "%" #{supplyName} "%"
and a.receiptor_depart_name like "%" #{departName} "%"
and DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y%m%d%') like "%" #{ym} "%"

select
distinct
from t_xietong_supply_record
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_xietong_supply_record
ID,
supply_id,
supply_name,
supply_type,
receiptor_id,
receiptor_depart_id,
reamark,
isdelete,
createtime,
amount,
receiptor_name,
receiptor_depart_name,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{receiptorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_xietong_supply_record
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_id = #{record.supplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_name = #{record.supplyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_type = #{record.supplyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiptor_id = #{record.receiptorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiptor_depart_id = #{record.receiptorDepartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reamark = #{record.reamark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isdelete = #{record.isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
amount = #{record.amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiptor_name = #{record.receiptorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiptor_depart_name = #{record.receiptorDepartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_xietong_supply_record set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_id = #{record.supplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_name = #{record.supplyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_type = #{record.supplyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiptor_id = #{record.receiptorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiptor_depart_id = #{record.receiptorDepartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reamark = #{record.reamark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdelete = #{record.isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, amount = #{record.amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiptor_name = #{record.receiptorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiptor_depart_name = #{record.receiptorDepartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_xietong_supply_record
supply_id = #{supplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_name = #{supplyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_type = #{supplyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiptor_id = #{receiptorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiptor_depart_id = #{receiptorDepartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reamark = #{reamark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiptor_name = #{receiptorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiptor_depart_name = #{receiptorDepartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_xietong_supply_record set supply_id = #{supplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_name = #{supplyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_type = #{supplyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiptor_id = #{receiptorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiptor_depart_id = #{receiptorDepartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reamark = #{reamark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiptor_name = #{receiptorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiptor_depart_name = #{receiptorDepartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
